title: It's a G-Funk Thang, Baby
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: NFL Week 5, G-Funk Super Bowl and your MOTHERS letting you know who was in charge!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones shares his thoughts on the happenings from Week 5 in the NFL, but more importantly, the announcement of a "G-Funk" Super Bowl Halftime show. Plus, an IYHH including the ground exploding in Siberia and your voicemails from when you "tried" your old man (or moms).


IYHH Stories

  1. @beckyferreira shares that the ground is literally exploding in Siberia: https://bit.ly/3isjvQX
  2. @JacquiPalumbo shares that a Danish museum lent an artist $84k, so he kept the money and called it ‘art’: https://cnn.it/3Abfq9Q
  3. @EOckerman says a study has found that half of young American kids have lead in their blood: https://bit.ly/3uF3gEY
